sentences.sContent: There was all the usual humbug and obligatory compliments from ministers.
sentences.sCn: 全都是些部长们常说的谎言和奉承恭维。

remMethod.val: hum (嗡嗡声) + bug (小虫) → 小虫嗡嗡叫， 欺骗少不了 → 欺骗

trans.tranOther: someone who behaves in a dishonest or insincere way, for example by pretending to be someone they are not
